Uses of Interface
com.itko.lisa.remote.IAgentInfo

    • Uses of IAgentInfo in com.itko.lisa.remote

      Classes in com.itko.lisa.remote that implement IAgentInfo 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AgentInfo2
      This class encapsulates information about an agent that is then made public to all interested parties so they can later subscribe to this agent events or invoke APIs on it.
      Methods in com.itko.lisa.remote with parameters of type IAgentInfo
